bibl.title: Photograph of John J. Moran, Hugo Ascanio, and Philip Showalter Hench standing in front of Ciudad Militar [Camp Columbia,] Quemados, Cuba, March 1941

div1.head: Photograph of John J. Moran, Hugo Ascanio, and Philip Showalter Hench standing in front of Ciudad Militar [Camp Columbia,] Quemados, Cuba, March 1941
div1.p:
6) Camp Columbia (military city) Quemados Mar-Apr 1941
The small bldg on the left is the office “Direccion”. It
partly occupies the site of the old officers quarters of 1900
The main part of the old officers quarters were about where
we (Moran, Capt Ascanio & I) are standing in the
street. The view is looking “south” (ie southeast)
toward the town & away from the ocean.
The street seen between “Direccion” & the 4th of Sept Clinic
is Gen Lee St & behind the → clinic is Santa
Rosa St
Santa Rosa
Gen Lee St
Clinic 4 of Sept
“Direccion” xxx←us
x photographer
The photographer was
standing near the
site of the old wards.
